title: Ranking system still messed up
body:
This is exactly what I mean. Riot needs to fix the rank system. how are you gonna make the other team with better kda fight against a team who has lower KDA with a person at LVL 31 with no RANK STATS? Tell me Riot. Honestly saying, you should only match Q with people in their own division. and People with NO division and or stats, they shouldn't be at this high of a level who did poorly in game. BETTER JG wins the game this season. as always.

https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=281469052740569&set=a.281469112740563&type=3&theater
